A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I liked this movie better than The Force Awakens. Overall it was fun and worth how long of a movie it was. My only gripe is the continued removal of the characters from the original trilogy every movie in this trilogy. Is there really a need to kill off every character? Even without finally seeing one of your favorite characters reveal being a lesser hero than they were in ROTJ. Very irritating. Otherwise great movie\, and worth seeing multiple times.
